Class MultipleScenarioWrapperException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.junit.internal.runners.model.MultipleFailureException

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class MultipleScenarioWrapperException
extends org.junit.internal.runners.model.MultipleFailureException
    Wraps multiple ScenarioExceptions.
    Author:
    ckeiner
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MultipleScenarioWrapperException​(java.util.List<ScenarioException> exceptions, java.util.List<ScenarioError> errors)
      Combines a list of errors and exceptions, then calls the super constructor MultipleFailureException(List).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getMessage()
      Returns a String with the stack trace of every Throwable.
      Needed by JUnit and ExtentReports to display the errors and exceptions properly.
      void printStackTrace​(java.io.PrintStream out)
      Prints the stack trace of every Throwable to the specified PrintStream.
